name: Play With A Pro
description: Enjoy all your favorite Play With A Pro content!
author: Platform Purple Inc.

scripts.buildElectronMacDev: CSC_LINK='./certificates/mac.p12' CSC_KEY_PASSWORD='leeloo2468' quasar build -m electron -t mat
scripts.buildElectronMacLive: PUBLISH_LIVE=true CSC_LINK='./certificates/mac.p12' CSC_KEY_PASSWORD='leeloo2468' quasar build -m electron -t mat
scripts.buildElectronWinDev: set CSC_LINK=certificates/windows.p12&& set CSC_KEY_PASSWORD=purplecert2468&& quasar build -m electron -t mat
scripts.buildElectronWinLive: set PUBLISH_LIVE=true && set CSC_LINK=certificates/windows.p12&& set CSC_KEY_PASSWORD=purplecert2468&& quasar build -m electron -t mat
scripts.resetAndroid: cd src-cordova; cordova platform rm android; cordova platform add android; cordova-splash; cordova-icon; cordova build android;
scripts.resetiOS: cd src-cordova; cordova platform rm ios; cordova platform add ios; cordova-splash; cordova-icon; cordova build ios;
scripts.pushiOSStaging: cd src-cordova; code-push release-cordova playwithapro-ios ios --deploymentName Staging
scripts.pushAndroidStaging: cd src-cordova; code-push release-cordova playwithapro-android android --deploymentName Staging
scripts.pushiOSProduction: cd src-cordova; code-push release-cordova playwithapro-ios ios --deploymentName Production
scripts.pushAndroidProduction: cd src-cordova; code-push release-cordova playwithapro-android android --deploymentName Production
scripts.prepack:win64: quasar build -c --mode electron --target win32 --arch x64 --theme mat
scripts.pack:win64: npm run prepack:win64 && electron-builder --win --x64 --project dist/electron-mat/UnPackaged/ --prepackaged â€¦/ekb-win32-x64/
scripts.publishElectronMacDev: npm run buildElectronMacDev; cd dist/electron-mat/Unpackaged; DO_KEY_ID=ELWGTOVSJRUL4MRMGRWX DO_SECRET_KEY=t+msUFpQRmSCxgx13+N9iqrQIkp9/17N1M5p7JwnuAg CSC_LINK='./certificates/mac.p12' CSC_KEY_PASSWORD='leeloo2468' build -p always;
scripts.publishElectronMacLive: PUBLISH_LIVE=true npm run buildElectronMacLive; cd dist/electron-mat/Unpackaged; DO_KEY_ID=ELWGTOVSJRUL4MRMGRWX DO_SECRET_KEY=t+msUFpQRmSCxgx13+N9iqrQIkp9/17N1M5p7JwnuAg CSC_LINK='./certificates/mac.p12' CSC_KEY_PASSWORD='leeloo2468' build -p always;
scripts.publishElectronWinDev: npm run buildElectronWinDev && cd dist/electron-mat/Unpackaged && set DO_KEY_ID=ELWGTOVSJRUL4MRMGRWX&& set DO_SECRET_KEY=t+msUFpQRmSCxgx13+N9iqrQIkp9/17N1M5p7JwnuAg&& build -p always
scripts.publishElectronWinLive: set PUBLISH_LIVE=true && npm run buildElectronWinLive && cd dist/electron-mat/Unpackaged && set DO_KEY_ID=ELWGTOVSJRUL4MRMGRWX&& set DO_SECRET_KEY=t+msUFpQRmSCxgx13+N9iqrQIkp9/17N1M5p7JwnuAg&& build -p always
